hero.title: The Keep Rate Blueprint
hero.subtitle: Learn the exact strategies the ultra-wealthy use to keep more of every dollar they earn. One actionable lesson per day, delivered to your inbox.

benefits.text: Understand why high earners stay stuck
Get actionable steps you can implement

curriculum.title: 5 Days to Understanding Your Keep Rate

days.title: The Hidden Tax on Success
days.text: Discover why earning more doesn't automatically mean keeping more, and the fundamental mindset shift that separates wealth builders from high earners.
days.takeaway: Calculate your current Keep Rate using our simple formula

days.title: The Structure Advantage
days.text: Learn how the ultra-wealthy use corporate structures to legally minimize taxes and maximize wealth retention - strategies available to any incorporated business owner.
days.takeaway: Identify if your current structure is costing you money

days.title: The Wealth Drains
days.text: Uncover the 5 most common places where business owners unknowingly lose wealth - and the questions to ask your accountant today.
days.takeaway: A checklist of wealth drains to audit in your own finances

days.title: Tax-Efficient Wealth Vehicles
days.text: Explore the investment and insurance strategies that let your money compound tax-free or tax-deferred - the same tools used by Canada's wealthiest families.
days.takeaway: Overview of vehicles that may apply to your situation

days.title: Building Your Wealth Plan
days.text: Put it all together with a framework for evaluating your complete financial picture and determining your next steps toward a higher Keep Rate.
days.takeaway: Your personal action plan for raising your Keep Rate

founder.title: Meet Behi Shafiei
founder.name: Behi Shafiei
founder.credentials: Founder, WealthBridge Consulting | Former Ontario Treasury Board Analyst
founder.bio:
After leaving my role as an Ontario Treasury Board Analyst to build a business, I quickly learned that earning more doesn't mean keeping more. In my first year as a realtor, a large portion of my $200K+ income disappeared to taxes.

I spent years learning how the ultra-wealthy structure their finances - incorporation strategies, tax planning, and capital positioning. Now I help Canadian business owners apply these same principles to raise their Keep Rate and build real, lasting wealth.

cards.title: Incorporated Business Owners
cards.text: You have a corporation but aren't sure if you're using it optimally for wealth building.

cards.title: High Earners
cards.text: You make more than you need to live on but feel like you're not getting ahead fast enough.

cards.title: Time-Strapped Professionals
cards.text: You don't have hours to research tax strategies but want to understand the fundamentals.

testimonials.quote: Finally, someone explained this in a way that made sense. I had no idea my structure was costing me so much.
testimonials.name: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: The day 3 lesson about wealth drains was eye-opening. I immediately scheduled a meeting with my accountant.
testimonials.name: Sarah Williams

testimonials.quote: Short, practical, and actually useful. This course should be required reading for every Canadian business owner.
testimonials.name: David Patel

cta.title: Ready to Raise Your Keep Rate?
cta.subtitle: Join 500+ Canadian business owners who've taken the first step toward keeping more of what they earn.
